remarks: Left composition with a monoid homomorphism yields a monoid homomorphism of structure powers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwsco2mhm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s A ) $.
pwsco2mhm.z $e |- Z = ( S ^s A ) $.
pwsco2mhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsco2mhm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
pwsco2mhm.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( R MndHom S ) ) $.
pwsco2mhm $p |- ( ph -> ( g e. B |-> ( F o. g ) ) e. ( Y MndHom Z ) ) $.
$d B g $.
$d F g $.
$d Y g $.
$d Z g $.
$d g ph $.
